fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.util

Class AbstractUriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.util.AbstractUriBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UriBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BerkeleyDbUri, BlueprintsUri, HBaseUri, InMemoryUri, MapDbUri

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public abstract class AbstractUriBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements UriBuilder
    An abstract UriBuilder that manages the assembly and the construction of URIs.

      • fromUri

        @Nonnull
public URI fromUri(URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: UriBuilder
        Creates a new URI from the given uri.

        This method checks that the scheme of the provided uri can be used to create a new UriBuilder. Its scheme must be registered in the BackendFactoryRegistry.

        Specified by:
        fromUri in interface UriBuilder
        Parameters:
        uri - the base file-based URI
        Returns:
        a new URI
